mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, code, name, up_code, page_print_code, type_code, seq, doc_code, gender_code, pym, wbm, is_del_nullline, is_common, is_end, is_valid, is_unique, is_page_print, is_audit, is_hosp, dept_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, record_time_code, (select count(id) from emr_classify where up_code = a.code and dept_id is null and hosp_code = #{hospCode}) as son, (select count(id) from emr_classify_template where classify_code = #{code} and dept_id is null and hosp_code = #{hospCode}) as tempHtml, valid_time from emr_classify as a where (id = #{id} or code = #{code}) and dept_id is null and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert: insert into emr_classify(id, hosp_code, code, name, up_code, page_print_code, type_code, doc_code, gender_code, pym, wbm, seq, is_del_nullline, is_common, is_end, is_valid, is_unique, is_page_print, is_audit, is_hosp, dept_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, record_time_code,valid_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{code}, #{name}, #{upCode}, #{pagePrintCode}, #{typeCode}, #{docCode}, #{genderCode}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{seq}, #{isDelNullline}, #{isCommon}, #{isEnd}, #{isValid}, #{isUnique}, #{isPagePrint}, #{isAudit}, #{isHosp}, #{deptId}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{recordTimeCode},#{validTime})
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, code, name, up_code, page_print_code, type_code, doc_code, gender_code, pym, wbm, seq, is_del_nullline, is_common, is_end, is_valid, is_unique, is_page_print, is_audit, is_hosp, dept_id, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from emr_classify where up_code = #{upCode} and hosp_code = #{hospCode} and dept_id is null order by seq DESC limit 1
mapper.update:
update emr_classify
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
up_code = #{upCode},
page_print_code = #{pagePrintCode},
type_code = #{typeCode},
doc_code = #{docCode},
gender_code = #{genderCode},
pym = #{pym},
wbm = #{wbm},
seq = #{seq},
is_del_nullline = #{isDelNullline},
is_common = #{isCommon},
is_end = #{isEnd},
is_valid = #{isValid},
is_unique = #{isUnique},
is_page_print = #{isPagePrint},
is_audit = #{isAudit},
is_hosp = #{isHosp},
dept_id = #{deptId},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
record_time_code = #{recordTimeCode},
valid_time = #{validTime},
where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.select:
select a.code as id,a.name as label,a.up_code as parentId ,if(a.is_end >0,true,false) as isEnd,b.id as templateId, a.valid_time as validTime from emr_classify as a left join emr_classify_template as b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.code = b.classify_code and IFNULL(a.dept_id,'') = IFNULL(b.dept_id,'') where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_valid = '1'
and a.dept_id = #{deptId}
and a.dept_id is null
and a.type_code = (select type_code from base_dept where id = #{ksDeptId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode})
order by a.seq asc

select e.code, e.name from emr_element e join emr_classify_element t on e.code = t.element_code where t.classinfo_code = #{code} and t.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and e.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and t.dept_id is null and e.type_code = '5' and e.is_require = '1'

SELECT id, hosp_code,CODE,NAME,up_code,page_print_code,type_code,doc_code,gender_code,pym,wbm,seq, is_del_nullline,is_common,is_end,is_valid,is_unique,is_page_print,is_audit,is_hosp,dept_id,crte_id, crte_name,crte_time,record_time_code,valid_time FROM emr_classify WHERE up_code = 'EMR' AND type_code = '2' AND is_valid = '1' AND is_end = '0' AND (dept_id = '' OR dept_id IS NULL) and hosp_code =#{hospCode}
